div.head: Test file for validation
div.p: This file is designed to pass validation.
We changed the title element's type attribute to permit some of these values:
Test inclusion: Syd Bauman and Martin Holmes are working on these tests in Providence and Victoria for the TEI.

div.head: Test of dataRef
div.p:
I'm not about to try to work measureGrp into four clever sentences, so:
corresp: dataRef w/ key
Should be valid, as 0 is a teidata.count (i.e., non-negative integer.)
select: dataRef w/ name
Should be valid, as 1 is a non-negative integer.
sameAs: dataRef w/ key & restriction
Should be valid, as 2 is a 1- or 2-digit teidata.count (i.e., non-negative integer).
copyOf: dataRef w/ name & restriction
Should be valid, as 34 is a 1- or 2-digit non-negative integer.

div.head: Testing content model and occurences of element refs
div.p:
The following bibl should be valid. It should be invalid if you add 2 more publisher elements (for a total of 4), but is not. See 354.
one two uno dos tres quatro cinco ich ni

p.s: This is a sentence with a short phrase and a single word.
The word should require the ana attribute, but the phrase not.
